results.title: Latest SQL Server Service Packs and Hotfixes
results.audit: SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') as Version;

results.title: 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'ad hoc distributed queries';

results.title: â€˜CLR Enabled' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'clr enabled';

results.title: 'Cross DB Ownership Chaining' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Cross db ownership chaining';

results.title: 'Database Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Database Mail XPs';

results.title: 'Ole Automation Procedures' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Ole Automation Procedures';

results.title: 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Remote access';

results.title: 'Remote Admin Connections' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: USE master; SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Remote admin connections' AND SERVERPROPERTY('IsClustered') = 0;

results.title: 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option to 0
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Scan for startup procs';

results.title: Disable the 'sa' Login Account
results.audit: SELECT name, is_disabled FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;

results.title: Rename the 'sa' Login Account
results.audit: SELECT name FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;

results.title: AUTO_CLOSE OFF on contained databases
results.audit: SELECT name, containment, containment_desc, is_auto_close_on FROM sys.databases WHERE containment <> 0 and is_auto_close_on = 1;

results.title: Set The 'Server Authentication' Property To Windows Authentication mode
results.audit: xp_loginconfig 'login mode';

results.title: Revoke CONNECT permissions on the 'guest user' within all SQL Server databases excluding the master, msdb and tempdb (Scored)
results.audit: USE testDB; SELECT DB_NAME() AS DBName, dpr.name, dpe.permission_name FROM sys.database_permissions dpe JOIN sys.database_principals dpr ON dpe.grantee_principal_id=dpr.principal_id WHERE dpr.name='guest' AND dpe.permission_name='CONNECT';

results.title: Drop Orphaned Users From SQL Server Databases
results.audit: EXEC sp_change_users_login @Action='Report';

results.title: Do not use SQL Authentication in contained databases
results.audit: SELECT name AS DBUser FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name NOT IN ('dbo','Information_Schema','sys','guest') AND type IN ('U','S','G') AND authentication_type = 2;

results.title: Set the 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' Option to ON for All SQL Authenticated Logins Within the Sysadmin Role
results.audit: SELECT SQLLoginName = sp.name FROM sys.server_principals sp JOIN sys.sql_logins AS sl ON sl.principal_id = sp.principal_id WHERE sp.type_desc = 'SQL_LOGIN' AND sp.name in (SELECT name AS IsSysAdmin FROM sys.server_principals p WHERE IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('sysadmin',name) = 1) AND sl.is_expiration_checked <> 1;

results.title: Set the 'CHECK_POLICY' Option to ON for All SQL Authenticated Logins
results.audit: SELECT SQLLoginName = sp.name, PasswordPolicyEnforced = CAST(sl.is_policy_checked AS BIT) FROM sys.server_principals sp JOIN sys.sql_logins AS sl ON sl.principal_id = sp.principal_id WHERE sp.type_desc = 'SQL_LOGIN';

results.title: Set the 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option to 1
results.audit: SELECT name, CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Default trace enabled';

results.title: Set 'Login Auditing' to Both failed and successful logins
results.audit: XP_loginconfig 'audit level';

results.title: Set the 'CLR Assembly Permission Set' to SAFE_ACCESS for All CLR Assemblies
results.audit: SELECT name, permission_set_desc FROM sys.assemblies where is_user_defined = 1;
